bike.description: Specialized FACT 10r carbon, FACT construction, aero-shaped tubing, compact race design, tapered 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" headtube, internal cable routing, carbon OSBB

components.description: Specialized Venge FACT carbon full monocoque, OS race for 1-3/8" bearing
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower, stainless steel cartridge bearings, w/ custom Venge top cap
Specialized Venge Aero, FACT carbon, flippable 20/0mm offset
